comments: A good concept that needs some work.   The good.   The puzzles gradually ramp up the difficulty.   The visuals and sound are very good for the app.   Some requests   An ad free one time paid version would be nice  The game needs some tool tips. Like if you click on a object in the game. It should tell you some stats. Like power capacity and power requirements.   How about an in game Twitter and or email contact link.   Can power lines please be able to spit off into 2 different directions  The only bad  Too many ads and the ads are too long 30+ seconds.

Won't let me play 1st level. The screen shows what i think is a pause menu over the game. The screen says start but it will never start no matter where you press non of the buttons work. Game sucks. I dont know how it plays because it wont let me play. Dont install this app its bugged

Lovely little game. Starts out easy showing you the controls/events, but quickly ramps up the puzzle. Speech bubbles get in the way of putting lines down and cause you to lose because you only had 30s to complete the level. Adding an option for a topdown view would solve this because then you could actually see all the directions instead of only 2-3 at a time. Oh and the ads suck. Can we buy a version without them?

What the game is this....everything in the game matters...the no of poles which decides the resistance...the current flow in it indicating potential difference...3 lines conduct more than 2 and single lines...the hurricanes and disconnections indicate open circuit.... I'm an electrical student...finally finished the game...this game is fantastic...just need one more such game from STATNETT...thank you for this game....the other app ohm is also good...plzz develop one more such game!!!!!!!! THE FUTURE IS DEFINITELY ELECTRIC!!!

Creating lines maneuvering needs improvement. It's hard, I have to zoom in just to get it right. But over all, it's a nice game. Now, I get to understand the complexity. Often times, we in our area simply complain about brownouts without knowing the critical planning and action being done in the background. Kudos!
Opened to just a black screen that played music. Absolutely no indication that anything was happening. My screen might as well have been locked, except I could still swipe in the notification bar
description: Without electricity there is chaos. Balance is a free puzzle game about electricity and power grids. Your goal is to make sure there are no blackouts, that the power grids are functional, and that you always produce the right amount of power.The game offers many challenges you probably never thought about: - Did you know that the amount of power produced is changed all day and night to match the amount we use? - Did you know that there is a limit on how much power you can transmit through a single power line without it getting overloaded? - Did you know that an well-built power grid could have any one line disconnected without causing blackouts?You do not need any knowledge about electricity or power grids in order to enjoy this game. Balance is developed by Statnett, the system operator in the Norwegian energy system, and is based on real challenges they work with every day.
descriptionHTML:
Without electricity there is chaos. Balance is a free puzzle game about electricity and power grids. Your goal is to make sure there are no blackouts, that the power grids are functional, and that you always produce the right amount of power.

The game offers many challenges you probably never thought about:
- Did you know that the amount of power produced is changed all day and night to match the amount we use?
- Did you know that there is a limit on how much power you can transmit through a single power line without it getting overloaded?
- Did you know that an well-built power grid could have any one line disconnected without causing blackouts?
You do not need any knowledge about electricity or power grids in order to enjoy this game.

Balance is developed by Statnett, the system operator in the Norwegian energy system, and is based on real challenges they work with every day.
recentChanges: Fixed a few bugs and breaking issues with some of the levels.
summary: Balance is a puzzle game where you build and maintain the power grid.
title: Balance

comments: Nice looking game, from what I can tell after 3 levels. Do I want to pay $15 to play more? I dont think it is that good. I do like the interactive intro/start up, and the game runs smooth. Graphics look nice. But still is it worth $15?  Dont think so, sorry guys. But I am sure other people might get enjoyment from this game so much they will pay to play. Good luck with it guys.

This game is by far one of the BEST games I've ever downloaded. There are so many different games within and the story line so far is awesome. I love how interactive it is and the fact that you have so much to work up towards! Yes the ads may suck but it's free so I can't complain. Absolute A+ for whomever created this, highly recommend and I hope there will be more games like this!

This is one of the BEST time management games I've ever played; I've never come across a time management game with such a beautiful story line. You will not regret playing this. Plus, this game doesn't force you to buy it; just sit through some ads. It's completely worth it. I can't stop raving about this game to my friends. Had me in tears a few levels into the story.

I can't unlock the Victor achievement. I've had every spot completely occupied, including the waiting area, check out and even the heart replenishing station and still nothing! I'll probably uninstall if this issue isn't resolved. The bonus level where you have to clean up all the diapers froze multiple times forcing me to restart which was really frustrating too.

Wow... just by reading the comments other people write impressed me. I love games with acual storylines... I thing all games should have a storyline now. (And yeah, I do love the game, I just hadn't finished it when I commented so I gave it a three for then.)

I loved it! So rare to find genuinely good mobile games but this was great! I didn't play the previous game (or games) but this one was amazing with the story, so well crafted. The gameplay was repetitive, but not boring. What happened to Victor!?!

descriptionHTML:
Your favorite doctor Allison is back in a gripping hospital time management game that you'll never forget! And neither will she... 🏥 🚑 🔥

❤️ PLAY THE EAGERLY AWAITED SEQUEL to Heart's Medicine - Time to Heal and join your favorite doctor on a breathtaking new adventure
❤️ BECOME A DOCTOR in 60 captivating time management levels and 30 extra challenge stages
❤️ DISCOVER 23 MINI-GAMES and perform special treatments, like filling lungs with oxygen, focusing readouts and removing negative emotions
❤️ WITNESS A MEDICAL DRAMA filled with romance, friendship, drama, and life-changing decisions
❤️ UPGRADE THE HOSPITAL by completing levels and earning new equipment across 6 heated chapters
❤️ CATCH UP WITH THE CAST and find out what's been going down with all your favorite characters from Little Creek Hospital
❤️ COMPLETE SPECIAL CHALLENGES and collect diamonds to decorate Allison's apartment
❤️ ENJOY MANY EXTRAS like competing against your friends in an endless level

Ready to find out what drama Heart's Medicine - Hospital Heat will bring our beloved doctor? 👩‍⚕️

This season picks up right after the previous compelling adventure. Things finally seem to have calmed down at Little Creek Hospital... 🏥

But not for long! When Allison receives a phone call from her mother, she doesn't know what to think. She hasn't seen her mom in over 20 years! Why would she contact Allison after all this time? And what could she want? Allison is left with no choice other than to face her past, in order to discover her future...
Will she have the strength to cope with everything that has happened and all that is yet to come? There's only one way to find out...

Help Allison face her tragic past in this fiery hospital time management game! 💉 🚑 🔥

Try the first few levels for free! The full complement of levels can be unlocked with an in-app purchase.

Follow Allison on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/heartsmedicinegame/

Zooming feature, 360-degrees multi-angle with well-graphic picture, providing a near real virtual reality.

Come! Along with brothers, we'l corner our enemy and battle if words don’t work.

If you don’t crush them here, tomorrow they'll crush you.

✔Background and communication, matters not. Here, there are only brothers and loyalty. 
✔Rule with brothers everywhere; Situate in the Coast, set aim for the vast East and into the world, unify the gang.

✔ Brawlers, not even the word‘human weapon'can describe their ferociousness. To them, conflicts are just general lifestyle. 
✔ Shooters are capable of wielding all kinds of arms, from submachine guns, rifles to artillery and many more. 
✔ Bikers, with tons of heavy locomotives which move like lightning, robbing and setting things alight. Definitely a nightmare for all gangsters! 
✔ Modified Vehicle can be done from a minivan to a military Hummer. There's nothing we can't change, only what you can't imagine.

description: Meet the continuation of the game series Survival in the Ocean!You are person who survived after airplane crash in deep ocean. No one around could help you. On the horizon is not visible land. Around only the ocean and hungry sharks.But fortunately, the boxes that were left behind after the plane crash are passing by! You have a hook with you! You can collect these boxes - they can have many useful resources and items. You should watch over your health and at the time of eating. At the top of the screen are indicators of health, satiety and oxygen levels. Take food to replenish your health. You can go fishing and then cook your food at the stake. So you can live longer.Dive into the water - there are many interesting things! Beware of dangerous hungry sharks. Craft a powerful tool in the workbench to protect yourself from sharks. Collect seaweed on the ocean floor, look for hiding places. From algae you can make a very nutritious soup!Make your raft as big as you can! Collect different resources. Use them to craft new items. Use the workbench and oven to open new recipes for craft.Ocean Survival 3D - 2 features:- Ultimate ocean survival simulator- Life on raft- Dangerous underwater world- Easy learning craft system- Optimized graphics- Realistic visual effectsDive into deep ocean, explore underwater world! It's time to survive with Ocean Survival 3D - 2!
descriptionHTML:
Meet the continuation of the game series Survival in the Ocean!
You are person who survived after airplane crash in deep ocean. No one around could help you. On the horizon is not visible land. Around only the ocean and hungry sharks.

But fortunately, the boxes that were left behind after the plane crash are passing by! You have a hook with you! You can collect these boxes - they can have many useful resources and items.

You should watch over your health and at the time of eating. At the top of the screen are indicators of health, satiety and oxygen levels. Take food to replenish your health. You can go fishing and then cook your food at the stake. So you can live longer.

Dive into the water - there are many interesting things! Beware of dangerous hungry sharks. Craft a powerful tool in the workbench to protect yourself from sharks. Collect seaweed on the ocean floor, look for hiding places. From algae you can make a very nutritious soup!

Make your raft as big as you can! Collect different resources. Use them to craft new items. Use the workbench and oven to open new recipes for craft.

Ocean Survival 3D - 2 features:
- Ultimate ocean survival simulator
- Life on raft
- Dangerous underwater world
- Easy learning craft system
- Optimized graphics
- Realistic visual effects

Dive into deep ocean, explore underwater world! It's time to survive with Ocean Survival 3D - 2!

comments: This game is not good. All you do is drive to a circle so an animation takes over while the avatar rescues a cat from a tree. Or you pull in to a circle and tap the screen a couple times to close a valve. You move from circle to circle being stuck in one spot at each one. There is very limited movement during tasks. And then on top of it you do all kinds of non-firefighter tasks. Clearing logs from a street? Really? That's a public works job. Closing a water valve? That's utilities. Rescuing a cat? Come on. That's animal control. Firefighters don't actually rescue cats from trees. And the missions are short. Pretty sure I finished the game in 20 minutes.

I can not get this game to work. It says 'Your hardware does not support this application'. This has happened with a few other fireman games. I have a new Sony XZ Premium phone so I don't understand why it won't work. Can anyone tell me if I can resolve this problem?
Good game, slightly annoying at times to control movement of the characters, tend to become awkward when trying to stay in straight line. Other than that is a good game to pass the time!
Made for kids....and made for them to accidentally click the rediculous amount of adds
Very good game we get a good experience of firefighters
The hose is kinda weird on the truck... Like... the cab...
description: Want to serve humanity? Like rescue, action, driving and parking games? NY City Firefighter 2017 awaits!On a bright sunny day in New York City, you encounter a building in flames! You are a courageous firefighter, and your duty is to rescue your fellow New Yorkers. Are you up for the challenge?! Grab your hose and slap on your combat boots; fires don‚Äôt wait for anybody. NY City FireFighter includes brigade truck driving, parking, and action play. Race through city roads with your team in a quick fashion. Evade traffic and keep pedestrians safe. Use your parking skills to avoid clashing with city vehicles. Next, embark on several rescue missions in different locations. There will be shopping malls, banks, schools, office buildings, and even hospitals to rescue! Drive your fire truck to a HOT location and COOL it down! Locate fire points using your radar to rescue within given time and get maximum mission completion points. descriptionHTML:
Want to serve humanity? Like rescue, action, driving and parking games? NY City Firefighter 2017 awaits!

On a bright sunny day in New York City, you encounter a building in flames! You are a courageous firefighter, and your duty is to rescue your fellow New Yorkers. Are you up for the challenge?! Grab your hose and slap on your combat boots; fires don’t wait for anybody. NY City FireFighter includes brigade truck driving, parking, and action play. Race through city roads with your team in a quick fashion. Evade traffic and keep pedestrians safe. Use your parking skills to avoid clashing with city vehicles. Next, embark on several rescue missions in different locations. There will be shopping malls, banks, schools, office buildings, and even hospitals to rescue!

Drive your fire truck to a HOT location and COOL it down! Locate fire points using your radar to rescue within given time and get maximum mission completion points. As you progress within the game, levels will become more interesting and challenging!


NY City FireFighter 2017 Features:

•Amazing visual and Cool sounds effects
•Super thrilling Firefighter Missions to complete
•Numbers of Firefighters Trucks and ambulances
•New York City Environment with Cool 3D Graphics
•Numbers of Animated People to Rescue
•Smooth, Easy & Addictive Gameplay

description: Adopt the cute rabbits bunny and help her to grow up, taking care of her, dress her up, decorate her house and make her the cutest of rabbits !Discover the city of bunnies with multiple activities and games to keep your pet busy. In rabbit city, you never get bored !üê∞  ADOPT BABY BUThis pet needs a new family. You have been chosen to take care of this rabbit and take care of it !üê∞  TAKE CARE OF HERTake care of Bu and become her best friend, help her to evolve from baby to adult to become the rabbit city star!üê∞  GIVE HER A STYLEA gigantic wardrobe awaits you to allow you to make your rabbit unique. From the princess outfit to the the rock star, your bunny will be the cutest !üê∞  A UNIQUE WORLDMake your rabbits pet's house a magical and unique place. Customize the rooms according to your tastes !üê∞  GAMES AND ACTIVITIESBu is part of a cute and imaginary world, she lives in the city of bunnies, a city populated with extraordinary rabbits.But many other animals are hidden there and they have with them magic items, it's up to you to find them to unlock unique clothes !You will also find many other activities and games in the city of rabbits: The sticker store to start a unique collection of beautiful pictures, the photo booth to show the world that you have the most cute rabbits, a beauty salon to change the appearance of your bunny so that it is unique.But also challenges, missions, trips and mini games to take care of your bunny and have fun so she never gets bored !Now that this game and the universe of bunnies has no secrets for you, come and discover and take care of this cute rabbits baby bunny !Your turn !This game is free but some activities or items described in this game description can be purchased with real money without any obligations.Privacy policy: http://www.buthebunny.com/Policy_EN.html
descriptionHTML:
Adopt the cute rabbits bunny and help her to grow up, taking care of her, dress her up, decorate her house and make her the cutest of rabbits !
Discover the city of bunnies with multiple activities and games to keep your pet busy. In rabbit city, you never get bored !

🐰 ADOPT BABY BU
This pet needs a new family. You have been chosen to take care of this rabbit and take care of it !

🐰 TAKE CARE OF HER
Take care of Bu and become her best friend, help her to evolve from baby to adult to become the rabbit city star!

🐰 GIVE HER A STYLE
A gigantic wardrobe awaits you to allow you to make your rabbit unique. From the princess outfit to the the rock star, your bunny will be the cutest !

🐰 A UNIQUE WORLD
Make your rabbits pet's house a magical and unique place. Customize the rooms according to your tastes !

🐰 GAMES AND ACTIVITIES
Bu is part of a cute and imaginary world, she lives in the city of bunnies, a city populated with extraordinary rabbits.
But many other animals are hidden there and they have with them magic items, it's up to you to find them to unlock unique clothes !
You will also find many other activities and games in the city of rabbits: The sticker store to start a unique collection of beautiful pictures, the photo booth to show the world that you have the most cute rabbits, a beauty salon to change the appearance of your bunny so that it is unique.
But also challenges, missions, trips and mini games to take care of your bunny and have fun so she never gets bored !

Now that this game and the universe of bunnies has no secrets for you, come and discover and take care of this cute rabbits baby bunny !
Your turn !

This game is free but some activities or items described in this game description can be purchased with real money without any obligations.

Privacy policy: http://www.buthebunny.com/Policy_EN.html

52 route de laverune, villa les colibris
34070 Montpellier
France

descriptionHTML:
Super Jabber Jump 3 is a Classic platform game. Take you back to the school days.

Jabber’s ancestral Gem was robbed by evil Monster. For taking the gold coins back, Jabber start his adventure.

Control Jabber to run, jump and pounce on monsters. Start your adventure, run across five worlds as you smash through those tricky monsters. Filled with unexpected obstacles, struggle to get to the FINAL destination. Then Jabber can take his Gem back. Are you ready?


Tips: attack tunnel monster in the midair, double jump over those long gaps.

Super Jabber Jump 3 Features:
- New puzzle elements, exciting adventure
- Classic platform game and easy to control
- Magnificent graphics, vivid and smooth animation
- 100 well-designed levels, full of challenges
- Tons of tricky monsters, difficult to handle
- Customized props, unlock and upgrade them to help you

Find hidden chests in the secret paths, open them, surprise you! But be aware of this: Monster is always with treasure. Time to take an adventure! Download for free! Let’s run and jump!

comments: Why every time I reopen the game, every skin of AC character and new map I got always gone? That had made me have to play it from the beginning again and over againüòë Infact, even I already connected my Google Play account to it..still I have to lost my progress again Wish you can fix this

This is a cool little game, fun and easy. The music is great. Would have been 5 stars if I didn't have to pay for the game to run smooth (no ads). Also had a very annoying reset issue after paying to remove ads.

Fun game. Cool to add Assassin's Creed stuff. I am a fan of AC so playing as a tiny Assassin is cute and fun. Challenging and frustrating at the sane time, but enjoyable. However...I am curious as to the Assassin selection. They added non popular Assassins like Evie/Jacob...and side characters such as Adewale. No Edward? No Connor? What gives? I'd trade all three of those nobodies for Connor lol.

The reason I have given it 4 stars as it's annoying to see that it doesn't save your progress. You teach a certain level and unlock almost all if the characters, to find out that when you start the application it resets to 0

For some reason every time I exit the game it always resets and goes back to zero and I lose everything I have. I purchased no in game ads and I don't know if that is the case but I would like this to be fixed. This is a very fun game but I don't want to have to play it over and over to keep unlocking things.

Horrible optimization due to ads. When I open the game with my wifi off it works fine. As soon as I turn on the wifi and the game stars fetching ads the whole gameplay becomes laggy and slow. It's not even in a state of being called free to play. x(

descriptionHTML:
Time for you and your friends to become the best little chefs around! No adults are around and you kids are hungry – you better prepare food, and fast! You guys are in charge – cook and bake whatever yummy food you want, and have a food fight!

Uh-oh – You’re starving, and no parents are home to feed you! It’s up to you and your friends to turn into gourmet chefs and make a delicious meal! Who said dinner before dessert?! You’re in charge now! Get creative in the kitchen and eat all the mouthwatering food you want!

Features:
> Is that your stomach growling? No one’s home to give you dinner, so you better get to the kitchen and start cooking!
> Turn into little kitchen wizards with your friends and prepare your favorite meals!
> Go to the supermarket with your friends and fill your carts to your heart’s desire!
> Choose yummy recipes to make, from 4 amazing cookbooks!
> Dress up as mini chefs, and clean up the messy kitchen! Don’t forget your chef’s hat!
> Use professional chef tools to make homemade pasta and pizza from scratch!
> FOOD FIGHT! Get messy in the kitchen.
> Bake cupcakes and make your own ice cream!
> You guys worked so hard making all that food – now it’s time to enjoy it in the dining room!
> Oh no! The oven exploded and one of your friends got hurt. Treat him with professional doctor tools so he can bake those treats!
> Have bake contests and vote for your favorite food. Who will win 1st prize?

comments: enjoy this game, welldone!!   Suggestion: can bring 2 or 3 weapons and swap in battle.    Hint for newbie, tripple bow is the key.   Dont waste money on entry level of each weapon, always save for the strongest. 1st start with tripple spear. The poison blowgun is good for earning money in training but very for later game level 80+  Get 25k is pretty easy to earn in daily rewards and training. I can get it in a few hours quickly, each training 4-10k point.

- if you are playing the game there is no option to get out of the app or to go to the main menu or restart the play.  - bug: even if the player is dead the game does not terminates this Happens for 5 times in 100 that is not a good show. - I loved played the app but I think you should test the app for the bugs and some missing functional points  - over all I will rate app 4 star & good

This is an excellent little arcade game with simple but challenging controls. I like the variety of different weapons you get to choose from and the graphics are lovely and evoke a kind of 'dawn of time' feel. The only criticism would be that earning ivory (the in game currency) is slow and there are no other options to obtain apart from buying some.

One of the best challenging game I've played so far. In the beginning it seems a very tough game (specially the terror bird story) but eventually you'll fall in track. One thing I would like to suggest that in gameplay, if there is an option to change the weapon (maybe in between 2 alternatives), then it would be more interesting. Thanks.

I have been playing for a good while now, however I had to take a break from playing for work and when I came back all my progress was gone. I I still have my achievements to show for it but I'd like my progress to be returned to me and I'll gladly rate better. Thank you.

Its great and addicting and has very little ads. The only thing I don't like is that the amount of levels needed to move on in the game and the prices if weapons are a bit too much. I would give it like a 4.8/5

◆ Popular game that achieved 10 million downloads worldwide!

​An intense hunting game of starving tribal people!
Hunt the primeval gigantic animals!

Long time ago, a bushman tribe lived in an outback town.
People were starving to death because of continuous droughts
The leader of the tribe goes out for hunting every day for living.....

Big Hunter is a dynamic physics game that hunts gigantic primeval animals with spear, axe and boomerang. Become the world's best hunter with a variety of weapons!

Big Hunter Features:
- Easy control with addictive touch of hitting
- Hunting game based on dynamic physics
- Simple but outstanding graphic design
- Rhythmical game sounds
- Challenge to the 100 levels with the near impossible!
- Show off your Hunt skills to all your friends via SMS, Facebook, Twitter, and more!

Big Hunter supports high resolution for an optimal gaming experience on both phones and tablets.

Are you already a fan? If so then visit our website, like us on Facebook for the latest news:

descriptionHTML:
Spielspaß und Herausforderung in einer App: Das neue kostenfreie Aufbauspiel „Mei Lidl Markt“ für Groß und Klein!

Du hast Lust, deinen eigenen Supermarkt zu planen, diesen immer weiter zu vergrößern und Waren wie frisches Obst & Gemüse, Getränke, Blumen und vieles mehr an deine Kunden zu verkaufen?

Dann bietet die Mei Lidl Markt App genau die richtige Herausforderung für dich!

Deine Aufgaben:
- Sammle Boni-Waren, um deine Filiale zu vergrößern
- Löse verschiedene Tagesaufgaben, z.B. leere 50 Mal die Kasse, um weitere Münzen zu bekommen
- Erspiele dir Trophäen, indem du z.B. eine Kundenzufriedenheit von mehr als 80% erreichst
- Meistere spontane Herausforderungen, indem du z.B. ein Rudel Möpse aus dem Markt vertreibst
- Sorge für die Zufriedenheit deiner Kunden, denn ihnen ist es wichtig, dass du frische und vielfältige Produkte in einer sauberen Filiale verkaufst

Features:
- Spannendes Aufbauspiel in farbenfroher Lidl-Welt mit herausfordernden Aufgaben
- Verschiedene Spielfiguren (Verkäufer, Kunden usw.), Waren und Verkaufsräume
- Strichcode-Detektiv: Scanne echte Lidl-Produkte für Lidl-Münzen, mit denen du den Boni- Automaten nutzen kannst.
- Boni-Automat: mit den hier erspielten Boni-Waren kannst du deine Filiale erweitern
- Statistik: Hier erhältst du jederzeit Einblick in Kundenanzahl und -zufriedenheit sowie deine Top-Produkte

Gut zu wissen:
- Die Updates zur App liefern regelmäßige neue Aufgaben und Erweiterungsmöglichkeiten
- Zielgruppe: Ab 6 Jahre
- Kindersicher: Keine In-App- Käufe, keine Werbung, keine Weiterleitung zu externen Links

Lidl Österreich wünscht viel Spaß beim Aufbau deines eigenen Supermarkts!
developer: Lidl Digital International GmbH & Co. KG
developerAddress:
Lidl Digital International GmbH & Co. KG
Stiftsbergstra√üe 1
74172 Neckarsulm
recentChanges: - Neue Filialstufe: Der erweiterte Supermarkt bietet dir viel Platz f√ºr neue Regale.
- Erweitertes Sortiment: Viele frische, neue Waren locken neue Kundengruppen an.
- Mitarbeiter-Upgrade: Du brauchst Unterst√ºtzung? Dann kannst du ab sofort neue Mitarbeiter einstellen.
- Mehr Abwechslung: Die Quests wurden erweitert.
summary: The new free building game "Mei Lidl market" for young and old!
title: Mei Lidl Markt

comments: I adore this game. For me, it is perfect and completely flawless. I used to play it when I was young and I have very lovely memories with this game. The reason I gave it 1 star only is that you only play 3 levels other than the tutorials and then you will have to buy it. I know it is my problem that I don't buy games in general but it is so sad that the game's developers are so rude and cruel and money-worshippers.

Used to love this game. The developers have done generally a good job porting it to Android. Sadly, on my device (Galaxy Tab S2), there seems to be a number of bugs with the neighbour getting into a loop from episode 1 of season 2. He goes looping with the parrot and with the bird on the top balcony. Fix these bugs and I'll raise my score. Funny how the bugs start after you have to pay!

Upon loading up the game I was treated to a 40 second advert. After that the menu loaded.   I pressed play and again was treated to another advert. After the level (walking though a door) another advert played.   I get it. The games rubbish. And your trying to get me to play something decent.  Sorry game deleted due to being mainly adverts.

I never actually played the game. I'm giving it such a low rating because there were so many ads that I had to sit through, I actually got bored with waiting for the game to actually begin. Just when I thought I'd get to play, another ad would pop up. I get bored quickly if I'm not being entertained...lol...so I uninstalled the game before I really ever played at all.

I used to play this game and love it.. But purchasing each level? Reallllly? Greedy developers! i hate it! Don't download this game! It let you play the instructions and 3 episodes then you have to pay for each episode! Waste of time and space really! 1 star is enough for this game..

Before the app fully loaded,  ad.. then you pick the 1st level,  ad. Then you return  the menu after the 20 second first level, ad. Could you make sure I like the app before destroying me with angry birds ads?

Start playing and getting comfortable is very simple, but you have to try to win. The real stars of soccer are those who win the World Cup and get the coveted Cup.

Today you can install and play FreeKick World Soccer Cup 2018 absolutely free. The game also has purchases, but they are optional.

Install our soccer, win and become the World Champion!

description: Surgeon! It‚Äôs a call from ER emergency room, patients suffering from various injury are waiting in emergency hospital. Let‚Äôs operate them and be a life saver in this brand new hospital games. Kids Hospital Emergency Rescue - Doctor Games provides you the life saving opportunity by doing some complex surgery inside hospital emergency room where you can apply some crazy medical procedures on hospital patient. So crazy doctor surgeon are you ready to use life saving tools, techniques and injection to become the life saver crazy surgeon in Kids Hospital Emergency Rescue - Doctor Games. This kids doctor games is the best educational app for kids where they learn how to be the life saver of patients when kids are on hospital duty. Hospital Emergency Rescue - Doctor Game provides lifeline to patient that are brought to hospital emergency room on ambulance. You can also take blood tests and give injections to patients.Treating patients with kindness using best time management skills that will make little kids expert hospital emergency doctor. ER Surgeon lets start with basic health checkup, monitor blood pressure, respiratory system, health and fitness in hospital kids doctor games. Hospital emergency is full of crucial patients suffering from different injuries, heart diseases that require crazy surgeon to be available. comments: Bowls bowling 3D It's a terrific game, fun and skill in deed! One recommendation; have more head to head without having to bet any coins. Betting for some reason slows the game and puts the players in a defensive position when ranked in a lessor tier. It's fun just to play and find people who also just want to have fun without that betting pressure. Make it more friendly, so the players can compete w each other not only to win coins! Please!

1 star as the game stands at the moment. There is an exploitable cheat mode where a player can make the opening shot very short  against a nearby part of the pier. Once that is done the second player cannot make a shot.  This is used far too often by cheating players.  Sort this and the game is playable.

A play mode which would follow  miniature  golf  a little  with small  elevation changes , off camber spots , obstacles  jump water , ramp threw tire. Different  playing fields like open parks with bench seats and walking stones for Hazzard.  The pier is cool to play on ,put some open knot holes on it for Hazzard. Multiple  modes to choose  from. The strait up mode is nice ...  but could  be better.  I like world league  it's a blast  and I'm doing very well in it. I gave you a 4star  app plays smooth  and the game itself  is fun. I'll be waiting for the upgrades.

TONY Revised from 2 stars to 4 stars as this as said before is an excellent game would have been 5 stars if it was not for the fact the top 10 or so players have a way to cheat without playing a game. So annoying and unfair. I suggest blanket the top 20 or so players to the same prize or find a way to stop them. Cheers for a great game though

Marc This game has made a big improvement since I last uninstalled. The is however a major glitch. When the Jack goes in the water it is replaced back where it started. This allows the leading player a massive advantage as all they need to do is pin the jack and will never lose an end, if the Jack is shot out please either play a dead end or put the Jack in the middle. More experienced players play the Jack to the side every time because they know they will win the end. Alternatively put a barrier in.

Fairly addictive I've grown to love this game. The gameplay is pretty smooth, with just an occasional hiccup. My one gripe is that it can take a while for the game to find you someone to play! By the way, how do you get into Season 3?

comments: Would have rated a 5, but I think the cost to continue a level ($300 and up) is disproportionate to the $$ awarded when you beat a level (< $50).  Exceptional storyline and graphics!  Cute animals and decorations. Love that I have several choices on some items. I hope new animals and habitats are available soon!
Ridiculous levels get to a point you can not beat the level even to spend money impossible.   Relaxing game to pass time turns into another delete like every game here.  Pathetic
It is quite a good game but it takes too long to win enough tickets or rocka to do anything at the zoo. Then it becomes frustrating. I refuse to spend money to get extra points.

I thought this game was fun UNTIL it said you had to WAIT FOR MORE QUESTS!  This happened after each completion of an enclosure...very frustrating!  Have been waiting two days, so far, for a new enclosure quest:(  Not very professional!

This game is ridiculous.   Have to do games to get things and then when you open up to get animals youbthen have to play multiple games to get items to expand or play or train.  Way too much and only get 5 lives for all the different games you are forced to play.

The game is enjoyable but I don't care for the new animated Charlotte. Instead of adding "realism", she is simply annoying. Other than that, it's fairly good. The number of coins needed to continue a level with 5 extra moves is a bit much compared to the number received when you complete the level (300 vs 25-30 or so). I understand, though. It can't be too easy or else it would be boring & nobody would ever spend any $ to advance!üòÅ

descriptionHTML:
Build a zoo, play with cute animals and solve match 3 puzzles - all in one game!

Switch between the challenge of the match 3 levels, and the joy of welcoming a new furry friend to the zoo you built with your hands.

The Family Zoo was once the gem of the neighborhood. Now, the city wants to build a huge supermarket instead. It’s time to burst their bubble!

Solve casual match three puzzles to earn tickets and materials. Then, restore the zoo and decorate the animal habitats and surrounding gardens.

Meet new and old friends, and work together to make sure all the animals have a place to live. They are counting on you - can you save their home?

Game Features
✿ Swap between match 3 levels and building your own zoo!
✿ Hundreds of delicious and challenging match 3 puzzles
✿ Choose from thousands of decorations to make your family zoo unique!
✿ Interact with exotic and cute animals
✿ Develop your business with stands, cafes and other attractions to draw visitors and earn coins!
✿ Complete quests for more rewards and advancing the story
✿ Make friends with characters that will help you save the zoo
✿ Enhance your fun with exploding watermelons and other wacky boosters

Plarium LLC
075 Creekside Drive, Suite 100
Portage, MI 49024
United States
recentChanges: Hmm... Looks like we miss some animals in your new Asian location... Guess whom? That's right - red pandas!  Hurry up to prepare the best cosy home for them and enjoy these cuties! New match-3 levels and quests are already waiting for you!
summary: Crush Match 3 Puzzles, Complete Fun Quests and Save the Animals!
title: Family Zoo: The Story

comments: Love it but Ive been playing it for a while now but out of no where it keeps saying unfortunately loop taxi has stopped. It won't let me play it at all. I thought, okay, I can deal with grinding to get in game coins to buy a vehicle. But the only way to purchase those cars is with real money ($25 each) and not in-game currency. A game where you have to literally pay to win is not fun, and leaves no point to playing if the intent is to unlock all the things and accomplish all the achievements if it means spending $50 to buy virtual vehicles.

Im currently sat here with all this cash after buying all levels and all vehicles. Their needs to be an option to modify vehicles so you can make them faster and have more seats. The tap does not allways work and when it does you hit somethong. Needs improvement but a good concept. Maybe even a longer road to cross or an never ending level to see how far you can get theres the option to add different modes of gameplay. But really needs work at the moment.

comments: This game is very interesting. The battles you have against others is good, but I wish the Characters had more verity in they're animations. Also the money you get once you win is too low. Leveling up only takes 2-3 fights. Getting gear to make them stronger takes 3-6 games.   Also; if this game gets an update I want the characters to have voiced lines depending on if they win or lose. As easy as it is to see the negatives there are some positives: game play is smooth and plays just like you want it to.  If it wasn't for the bad rewards I would say this is one of the best games Facebook

HEAR ME OUT KILOO... This game is fun and all but not all people (like myself) cant afford data and stick to wifi often. And that sucks because this is such a great game. And the fact that you cant play it on the go ruins the fun. So please... PLEASE... have an offine mode for this game.

descriptionHTML:
The world of Freecraft is waiting for you in the new game FreeCraft My Buildings. Now this world is even more diverse. Behind every corner of this cubic world a new story awaits you. You can watch the wildlife in Creativity mode or participate in her life in Survival mode. But do not think that it's so easy to survive in the world of Freecraft, because it's only in the daytime that ordinary predators can attack you, from which you can hide in a tree or in a hastily built hovel. And at night absolutely other monsters who are hungry to taste your flesh awake!

Do not forget about Multiplayer, in which you can survive with your friends, they will always support you in a difficult situation!
 
Build a house, grow vegetables or arrange a PvP battle!

Features:
- New graphics in pixel style
- New unique mobs
- Several additional biomes that you can find in Freecraft spaces
- 3 modes: Survival, Creative and Survival in Multiplayer
- Crafting system, both on a computer
- Multiplayer and a huge number of servers
- Beautiful Texture Pack
- Unique gameplay

Download Free Craft My Buildings for free, create a world in which you want to live!

descriptionHTML:
Take control of some amazing police drift cars (speed car, SUV, and 4x4) in a huge driving environment ready to explore, with a big city, forests, canyons, hills and mountains: more than 16 km² of area and 30 km of roads!
Drive fast and drift hard on 8 amazing different tracks.

!! Police Drift Car Driving Simulator contains 24 free levels !!
It is the latest and one of the best police car drifting simulators!

Make your choice between city cars, offroad cars, and speed cars.
Customize them with brush and decals, then change tire, wheel, smoke colors, and more...
Drift in a whole city with realistic and intense traffic, and try 8 tracks to pull off super long drifts.
Complete tons of missions to become a professional drifter and a good cop!

The city is very big with real traffic cars, buildings, houses, bridges and traffic lights.
Drive around and see the sights like rivers and lakes, an ancient Japanese temple, airport with other aircrafts and planes, secluded houses and farms, ruins, a camping place, and more...
The road system is also very dense, with highways and 2x2 lanes, to the very small roads of mountains, with hill-climb.


Features :
- Hugely open-world driving simulator with city, construction, dockyard environments... filled with wide open roads, mountains, hills and forests
- Miles of roads to drift and drive on and do stunt jumps
- Full customization for police cop cars
- Dynamic traffic with real and intense traffic AI
- Realistic driving simulator, ultimate driving experience
- Realistic drifting physics
- High-quality vehicles
- Dynamic camera angles
- Easy to play driving controls, use touch, wheel and tilt controls!

You can adjust the quality button to play without lag.

Show off your amazing drifting and car driving skills, perform awesome car stunts in one of the best free car driving simulators available!

This game offers the massive open world for the best car driving simulator game experience! Race, drift, crash, jump, and flip around a huge detailed open city, perform tricks and stunts, and have fun! The most realistic and extreme car driving game you'll ever experience, Police Drift Car Driving Simulator!

comments: I really like the game...I love all of your games, but I'm a little disappointed with this one. How can you not have any white veils or shoes in a wedding game? Why no black shoes for the groom? And the flower girl looks like a cartoon! You guys need to make some changes but overall I love this game...‚ù§

Made the mistake of buying this. There are no white veils, which is ridiculous. No black or brown hair. No different skintones.  Hairdos are very limited. The flower girl looks weird. And the gameplay itself is frustrating. When you hit the checkmark in a location it just randomly takes you to another area. And if you've already been there you have to do it over again or the game will just assign random stuff. When you hit the checkmark it should just take you back to the map. The setup now is just dumb. Save your money. Wish I could get mine back.

description: Are you crazy fans of fire and water or fire and ice (teamwork game) ?Fall in love adventure maze game and remember it from childhood ?Fire Red boy and his lover (ice girl - Water girl) who go with him is a puzzle adventure game for two players. It's an very addicting game to play with your kids, your lover and your friend.You've got two characters to control in this exciting puzzle game. Lead Red boy and Water girl to their doors in each level of the Crystal Temp Maze, collecting fire diamonds and ice diamonds along the way. Red boy must avoid the water and Ice girl must avoid the fire, and be careful, the black water kills them both. Using your brain to control objects in game such as lever, pusher, mirror, black ball, light beam, elevator, wind machine, pulley systemin order to open path that leads to the doors.GREAT GAME FEATURES:- 30 Maps and continue update - Nice character fire boy is red boy- Nice character blue girl is water girl- Always support .All levels are updating frequently- Nice Soundtrack- Classic gameplay from web- Back to childhood
descriptionHTML:
Are you crazy fans of fire and water or fire and ice (teamwork game) ?

Fire Red boy and his lover (ice girl - Water girl) who go with him is a puzzle adventure game for two players.
It's an very addicting game to play with your kids, your lover and your friend.
You've got two characters to control in this exciting puzzle game.
Lead Red boy and Water girl to their doors in each level of the Crystal Temp Maze, collecting fire diamonds and ice diamonds along the way.
Red boy must avoid the water and Ice girl must avoid the fire, and be careful, the black water kills them both.
Using your brain to control objects in game such as lever, pusher, mirror, black ball, light beam, elevator, wind machine, pulley system
in order to open path that leads to the doors.

- 30 Maps and continue update
- Nice character fire boy is red boy
- Nice character blue girl is water girl
- Always support .All levels are updating frequently

- Classic gameplay from web
- Back to childhood

description: Welcome to Farm Tractor Trolley Cargo Simulator 2018!You have obviously driven four gear cars and trucks on mixed tracks, but this is the time you should try stunning four gear drive on a Farm Tractor with dissimilar wheel size. You should try driving an auto mobile whose wheel size is not same, believe me its significantly difficult. Eight cylinder large beam engine make it even difficult to practice conventional driving skills on a Heavy Tractor. Live the life of village farmer & transport your life's earning to the city market.Fulfill your cargo transportation dreams with the new heavy tractor trolley driving simulator. Dry run your extreme cargo transportation skills on this new modified version of cargo transport simulator to check your heavy duty transporter handling skills on mountainous tracks and elevated roadsides. Transporting loaded trolleys with the help of a heavy tractor is not as easy as it looks like. This Heavy tractor cargo transport sim composed of very difficult yet exciting game play options which challenge your cargo transportation skills on various deadly tracks. Transport farming products like wheat, forage grass, pumpkins and other crops.Majority of young generation is not aware of what a tractor is, but it is the foremost component of farming even in this modern era. Farming is incomplete without cargo tractors which help transport farming goods from one place to other. This brand new 3D cargo transporter game will give you the real life experience of driving heavy duty cargo tractors and natural atmosphere which you have never experienced. Transportation of goods from city market to farm cites is not possible without real tractor cargo transport. This needs pro cargo driving skills due to long and bouncy tracks. Challenge your heavy duty tractor driving skills in Tractor Cargo Simulator, grow your farm and become the all time best cargo transport driver of the city.Cultivated crops when harvested are loaded from various farming fields and action villages on Heavy Tractor Trolleys. Forage plough farming also need Heavy Tractor to move to nearby markets after being loaded by the help of little cranes. This latest Tractor trolley Simulator is equipped with charming 3D graphics and a variety of locations and dangerous tracks to drive on while challenging your tractor trolley driving skills. You can enjoy variety of farming modes such as transportation of farming animals from different locations, transporting fertilizers and pesticides to protect your farm from insects attack, or delivering ready feed-stock to the nearby market to earn money. You can also transport wood logs from jungle sites to furniture markets to earn lot of money. Heavy Tractor Trolley Cargo:Rural Farmer Simulator Features:- Realistic cultivated lush green farms ready to be harvested- Go out in the field and load your tractor trolley with wood logs- Drive carefully to deliver farming goods to nearby city market- Manage everything on the ranch- Drive Over the Mountains and steep deadly tracks- Advanced engine physics and easy controls- Transport animals like sheep, goat & cows via truck driving- Loaded Tractor Trolley drive on Risky 3D tracks

descriptionHTML:
Tom, a Genius School graduate, is looking for his dream job. What’ll it be? Astronaut? Firefighter? Pilot? Guess again… he’s decided to become a superstar hairdresser! Only problem is, his bosses don’t let him touch actual hair… unless it’s on the floor. Poor Tom is only allowed to stick to menial tasks like scrubbing floors and answering phones. Play this mischievous hairdressing game to help Tom cut his way from “barberchop” around the corner to world-class designer hair salons… all while avoiding his bosses’ watchful eye.

Cheating Tom graduated Genius School. Now he’s got to enter the real world and get a job. So his days of sneaking around are probably over, right? WRONG. As they say, “once a cheater, always a cheater.” Play this game to help Tom become an amazing hairstylist without getting caught by his annoying bosses who are determined to keep him sweeping the floors day after day.

Features:
> Help Tom sneak his way from hair salon to hair salon!
> Hurry up and get playing! You’ve got 25 different hairstyles to master as you play this crazy game!
> Make sure he cuts and styles customers’ hair as quickly as possible before his boss notices.
> Tons of challenging levels & supercool game play modes for ultra sneakiness.
> Score power-ups and collect coins to become sneakier than ever.
> WARNING: You may encounter some extremely peculiar customers…!
> Chop-chop! Cut that hair as fast as you can, and make sure the customers are satisfied, OR ELSE!
> Choose your game avatar - Tom or Taffy – and get cutting!
> Dress Tom and Taffy up in crazy costumes.

The game is okay it has a lot of faults. The matching system is horrible it always puts me against people that are hundreds of levels higher than me. And somehow their money regenerate quicker and they're able to send  out more and bigger and better units out on the battlefield. Even when the matchmaking system puts me against somebody my own level their money regenerates quicker than mine and they send out a lot more units faster than I can for whatever reason. Uninstalling this game

I absolutely love this game! As a person who enjoys strategy games, from RTS such as Stronghold, Supreme Commander, and C&C, this game takes my top 3 for the phone. The match making system is very good at keeping same skilled players together, as well as it isn't very much a pay to win game. The units are decently balanced and the game isn't to slow or fast. Definitely a game I will keep playing for a long time. I do want to ask, if you guys will be putting in a "survival mode", and withstand against waves of enemies. Great job FourThirtyThree

I'll update whenever I can actually play the game. It's up to date. I get to the screen that asks if I'd like to use my Google account or Facebook account. I do not have a Facebook. Obviously I have a Google account. I'm writing this review. I click Google and both options disappear. It sets at that screen where the two options were previously available and nothing happens. I made sure to wait around 5 mins to see if it was a loading issue.. dunno. I'd love to try out the game.

This game is awesome, it reminds me of Guns Up! . The ONLY thing I don't like about it is it's basically pay to win. I only have 5 slots to open chests and it cost gems to open the chest and money to get gems. Other than that, the gameplay is solid. It's very unique in it's actually a wonderfully crafted game and not some thrown together garbage. I probably will end up throwing money at it only because it's made so we'll. But like I said I do feel the process for opening chests is a bit too cash hungry...

Take control of the battle and be ready to bring on the BOOM with over 70 different types of units. Whether it is swarming the opponent with infantry troops, blasting your way through enemy defenses with tanks or surprising the enemy with exploding rats!
Do whatever it takes to be the one with the best strategy and to emerge victorious!
Battle it out and become the most feared commander and expert strategist.

FEATURES
- Global real-time strategy battle!
- Enjoy the vast and panoramic battlefield and adapt your strategy.
- Bring on the BOOM with over 70+ units and weapons at your disposal!
- Join forces with your Legion members and battle your way to the top of the world!
- Enjoy the face melting graphics!
- Limitless strategy to blow up your enemies with the use of tanks or unit-producing buildings.
*Disclaimer: BOOM is not an addiction, it’s a necessity!

descriptionHTML:
Rover Builder GO is a unique physics based racing game. Build your own vehicle and win the competition!

In the garage you can build any kinds of physically accurate rovers from the scratch. Only your creativity sets the limits. When the rover is built you're ready to go. Avoid scary ravines and climb over the hills as fast as you can.

You are racing against other real players, trying to rise to the next division. Division rankings are shared every day so you need to stay sharp to climb to the top. As you succeed in the race you’ll get money to upgrade and buy new parts to your rover.

Are you ready to compete in this cosmic race of crazy rovers?

Internet connection required for full functionality.


Follow Us:
* Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/roverbuilder/
* Web: https://www.roverbuilder.com/
summary: Wild racing and building with physics based mechanics!
title: Rover Builder GO - Build, race, win!

description: Wow, it looks like you got into unusual dreams about falling humans on a flat floor. It's pretty amusing, but you'll have to find a way to get out of those dreams.Otherwise, you will have to spend eternity in such a dream and fall on a flat floor again and again with other human and beasts. To find a way out, the fall human combined into gangs and arranged a beast tournament in fights without rules to find out which gang is steeper.You will have to fight like an beast with other fall human on a flat floor, so that your gang will become the winner and be able to get out of these strange dreams. Show your wit and use the environment in your favor.Let the laws of physics become your allies in beast fighting without rules between gangs. Let the fall human on the flat floor understand that you can not be stopped and only you and your gang deserve victory.
descriptionHTML:
Wow, it looks like you got into unusual dreams about falling humans on a flat floor. It's pretty amusing, but you'll have to find a way to get out of those dreams.
Otherwise, you will have to spend eternity in such a dream and fall on a flat floor again and again with other human and beasts. To find a way out, the fall human combined into gangs and arranged a beast tournament in fights without rules to find out which gang is steeper.
You will have to fight like an beast with other fall human on a flat floor, so that your gang will become the winner and be able to get out of these strange dreams. Show your wit and use the environment in your favor.
Let the laws of physics become your allies in beast fighting without rules between gangs. Let the fall human on the flat floor understand that you can not be stopped and only you and your gang deserve victory.
summary: Get out from unusual dreams about human fall on a flat floor
title: Human on Flat Floor - Fall Gang Fights

description: SubZone - KamchatkaHere is a free, 3D multiplayer submarine battle adventure for your phone or tablet!Thanks to everyone for your suggestions and requests on how to improve the original Submarine Simulator 3D. Please keep the suggestions and ideas coming and we will try to include them in the updates. Do you have a favorite submarine you would like to see in the game? Let us know and we will try to include it.~ Cyclops GamesIn this new version:* Battle a rogue warlords navy that have set up port in the remote islands off Russia's Kamchatka Peninsula.* Sink cruisers, destroyers, weapon-carrying cargo tankers, and drug-running fish boats.* Outwit competing subs in multiplayer mode for salvage and gold bars.* 6 modern submarines you can command* Restock your torpedo supply by salvaging them from ships and submarines you sink* Explore the seafloor for crates of ammo, repair equipment and gold bars* Use your periscope with and homing torpedoes to blow up enemy vesselsPlease rate and review and send us your requests to make this game better ~ Coming soon: SubZone - Red Sea SkirmishNOTES:  BETA VERSION:====================We are still perfecting the multiplayer logic* updates will be frequent while we get everything working* send us an email and tell us about any bugs or problems MULTIPLAYER:===================* Since WiFi connections on mobile devices are not the best, you may see the game trying to reconnect at times.* It is important that the player "hosting" the game has a good connection and keeps the game in the foreground* If the player who is hosting the game does not keep the game in the foreground on the device, they will be bumped  back to the main menu, and another player will automatically be assigned as the new host* The number of subs you have sunk shown in the bottom left is a tally of subs sunk in multiplayer mode
descriptionHTML:
SubZone - Kamchatka

Here is a free, 3D multiplayer submarine battle adventure for your phone or tablet!

Thanks to everyone for your suggestions and requests on how to improve the original Submarine Simulator 3D.

Please keep the suggestions and ideas coming and we will try to include them in the updates.

Do you have a favorite submarine you would like to see in the game? Let us know and we will try to include it.
~ Cyclops Games


In this new version:

* Battle a rogue warlords navy that have set up port in the remote islands off Russia's Kamchatka Peninsula.

* Sink cruisers, destroyers, weapon-carrying cargo tankers, and drug-running fish boats.

* Outwit competing subs in multiplayer mode for salvage and gold bars.

* 6 modern submarines you can command

* Restock your torpedo supply by salvaging them from ships and submarines you sink

* Explore the seafloor for crates of ammo, repair equipment and gold bars

* Use your periscope with and homing torpedoes to blow up enemy vessels

Please rate and review and send us your requests to make this game better

~ Coming soon: SubZone - Red Sea Skirmish

NOTES: BETA VERSION:
====================
We are still perfecting the multiplayer logic
* updates will be frequent while we get everything working
* send us an email and tell us about any bugs or problems

MULTIPLAYER:
===================
* Since WiFi connections on mobile devices are not the best, you may see the game trying to reconnect at times.
* It is important that the player "hosting" the game has a good connection and keeps the game in the foreground
* If the player who is hosting the game does not keep the game in the foreground on the device, they will be bumped back to the main menu, and another player will automatically be assigned as the new host
* The number of subs you have sunk shown in the bottom left is a tally of subs sunk in multiplayer mode
summary: Battle your friends in the ultimate underwater show down.  Download now.
title: Submarine Sim MMO
